inclusion.criterion: Patient with histological proven invasive breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical T1-T2 disease with no distant metastasis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient for whom conservative surgery with sentinel lymph node (SLN) technique is feasible from the start in terms of carcinologic
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of neoadjuvant chemotherapy or hormone therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of breast cancer (ipsilateral, i.e. recurrence, or contralateral breast)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of any other invasive cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Impossibility to undergo medical examinations of the study for geographical, social or psychological reasons
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of smoking and alcohol consumption.
